Location
Benu is housed in a historic building in the heart of San Franciscoâ€™s SOMA district. The restaurant is within walking distance of the Moscone Center, Yerba Buena Gardens, the Contemporary Jewish Museum and many hotels including the St. Regis, W, Four Seasons and The Palace.
22 Hawthorne Street San Francisco CA 94105
Hours
Benu is open for dinner Tuesday through Saturday. Seating times are available Tuesday to Saturday from 6:00pm to 9:00pm. Private dining is available at all times.
Reservation
Reservations are accepted by phone Tuesday through Saturday from 10:00am to 4:00pm at +1.415.685.4860, and can also be made online. Reservations may be made up to two months in advance and a credit card is required to hold the reservation.
